name: Seal Slammers
description: An unexpected "prophetic dream" leads you into the competition arena of Seal Slammers. Surging waves, joyful songs, and seal pups... What kind of story will unfold during this celebration of Phagousa's birthday?
introduction:
◆ Event Overview ◆
● An unexpected "prophetic dream" leads you into the competition arena of Seal Slammers. Surging waves, joyful songs, and seal pups... What kind of story will unfold during this celebration of Phagousa's birthday?

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In Seal Slammers, Trailblazers will team up with Bubbles to lead baby seals to victory. The competition consists of three stages: Group stages, elimination rounds, and the championship. Keep defeating opponents to advance.
● After completing each match in Story Mode, you can earn Seal Tokens, which can be used to purchase new seals at the Seal Shop.
● Once the competition progresses to a certain point, Arena Mode will be unlocked. Here, Trailblazers can battle against mysterious seal trainers from around the world and increase their rank.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● After completing each match in Story Mode, you will receive Melodies of Celebration.
● You can exchange Melodies of Celebration for rewards at the Prize Exchange.
● The pet "Bubbles" can be obtained from the Prize Exchange.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Seal Slammers limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Seal Slammers Arena in the Okhema map to experience and obtain regular rewards.
